I'm specializing in the new video technology of 360 Degree Virtual Reality production.

Cable and web channel streaming live coverage of the 'art scene' in South Florida.  Programming includes: behind-the-scenes views of artists creating art in their studios (painters, sculptors, dancers, musicians, etc.), art exhibits, master classes, dance & music concerts, symphonies, art camps, operas, rehearsals and live theater as well as interviews with local and visiting international artists, actors, directors, writers, filmmakers and curators.

goLIVEmiami.com is an internet based television news magazine channel devoted to giving viewers from around the world a behind-the-scenes look at culture, fashion, art, lifestyle and events in Miami and the Beaches.

Expect A Miracle Productions (EAM) supplies film and video production services. We take projects from concept to completion including television commercials, documentaries, corporate videos, fund raising videos and more. EAM also provides location scouting and managing services.

As the Fabulous Flying Fendelman Brothers, my brother and I renovated an old supermarket and built a 250 seat movie theater speciaizing in 'art films', retrospectives and mini-film festivals.   We served homemade pasteries, organic snacks, imported beer on tap, wine and champagne and Suji Mama spiced popcorn.

summary: I am involved in television and film production wearing many hats depending on the project: Field Producer on the A&E series '1st 48'​; Producer/Director, Discovry Latin America; Producer/Director, Telemundo Latin Digital; location scout for 'Miami Vice', 'Magic City'​ and 'Burn Notice; producer and director for PBS station WLRN TV CH 17 on ArtStreet with Meredith Porte for two years; produce and direct for promotional shorts and television commercials for the Broward Center for the Arts in Fort Lauderdale, the Miramar Cultural Center and the Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts in Miami; award winning documentary film maker.   I also have corporate clients and others.   You can view my reel at www.fendelman.comI am the founder and publisher of goLIVEmiami.com, ArtsAndCultureTv.com and Miami360vr.comSpecialities: Produce 360˚ Virtual Reality video for Samsung Gear Vr, Oculus and online.see www.Miami360vr.comSpecialties: I'm very good at telling a story on film.  I specialize in a documentary style approach to the projects, promotional films and television commercials I produce and direct.
